attributes.action: tv licence needs to be scrapped due to cover ups in the bbc in the wake of the jimmy saville child abuse case.
attributes.additional_details: why should we pay an enforced fee to a coraration that has covered up and brushed aside child abuse for the last 50 years...i believe we should make a stand and opt out of paying, by paying we are basically saying that everything is fine, when obviously it isnt....i for one no longer wish to support this organisation as i feel i have been duped and mislead....the licence fee should be scrapped.
